title: Ep 5. - Walking Threesome
description:
On today's show, the guys cover the Sesame Street creators confirming that Bert and Ernie are gay, the Vegas Golden Knights forging a gambling partnership with the William Hill Sportsbook, a baby in India being born with four arms and two penises, and teens protesting that they shouldn't have to stand in front of a class and give presentations because classrooms are their "safe spaces." The guys also choose who they'd like to take a shot with or take a shot at, answer some listener questions, and dive through their phone notes. Today's show is a great time, come and join us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @evanfoxy, @VivalaZito, and a comedy clip from @normmacdonald.
dc:creator: The Pod
